name: Anvil View Guest House
overview:
The Anvil View Guest House Gretna Green is two minutes walking distance from the World Famous Blacksmiths Shop, Anvil Hall, four minutes walk from the Blacksmiths Courtyard including The Smiths Hotel and two miles from the Mill Forge. Located in the heart of Gretna Green, we offer luxury bed and breakfast accommodation with rooms furnished to the highest standards.

We pride ourselves on providing our guests with home from home comforts and a pleasant and relaxed atmosphere.Our aim is to make your stay here at Anvil View a memorable one. Choose to relax in your room, garden or Summer House. Our accommodation here at Anvil View is of a very high standard yet competitively priced.

Gretna Green although famous for weddings is also the ideal location to visit the Scottish Borders as well as Carlisle, Cumbria and we are only an hour away from the lake district national park. We have information on hand to assist you in enjoying your stay.

We are a popular destination for wedding parties with being only across the road from the world famous Old Blacksmiths marriage rooms. Many of our guests opt to take exclusive use of Anvil View allowing you and your guests to enjoy your stay together, knowing you will be able to prepare in the peace and quite away from busy hotels.

A warm welcome awaits you .
